page.title: 18BEACH AMENITIES SURVEY(cont)
page.content: COASTAL AREA THAT COULD BE IMPROVED? More nightlife and entertainment needed.Gardens could be improved while the sea front houses could be tidied up.There could be better seafront seating and toilet facilities.There should be more parking areas,more Metros and a better bus service.There should be more events organised during the day as there is little on offer- local events should be better publicised and there should be more local authority organised events such as beach parties.The promenade and sea front walking areas could be improved.
